Fable.Title: Techspire HQ
Fable.Description: A day in the life at a bustling IT company headquarters.

Location.Name: Lobby
Location.Title: Building Lobby
Location.Introduction: You step into the modern lobby of Techspire HQ.

Fact.Text: Clean white walls and minimalist furniture surround you.
A receptionist desk stands to the north, unoccupied.
A security camera silently rotates above the entrance.

Exit.Name: North
Exit.Title: North
Exit.Description: Glass doors lead into the main office floor.

Fact.Text: Rows of desks with monitors, cables, and coffee mugs.
The hum of computers fills the air.
Some screens show code, others display spreadsheets.

Exit.Name: North
Exit.Title: North
Exit.Description: A hallway leads to the server room.

Fact.Text: A coffee machine gurgles next to a fridge full of energy drinks.
A couch and a ping pong table occupy the center.
The smell of microwaved meals lingers in the air.
Rows of blinking servers stand tall behind locked racks.
A low hum and a blast of cold air greet you.
A warning sign reads: "Authorized Personnel Only".

Exit.Name: South
Exit.Title: South
Exit.Description: Return to the main office floor.

Fact.Text: Stacks of old monitors and tangled cables clutter the room.
An old printer sits unplugged in a corner.
A large table and a wall-mounted display dominate the room.
Sticky notes and whiteboard scribbles from a recent meeting are still visible.

Exit.Name: East
Exit.Title: East
Exit.Description: Return to the main office floor.

Exit.Name: North
Exit.Title: North
Exit.Description: A hallway leads to the HR office.

Fact.Text: Soft music plays faintly in the background.
A bulletin board with company policies hangs on one wall.

Exit.Name: East
Exit.Title: East
Exit.Description: A short corridor leads to the CEO's office.

Fact.Text: Large glass windows overlook the city skyline.
A minimalist desk holds a sleek laptop and a succulent.
A shelf of awards lines one wall.
Workstations with dual monitors and testing devices fill the room.
Posters of bug life cycles and QA workflows are pinned to the walls.

Exit.Name: West
Exit.Title: West
Exit.Description: Doorway to the Main Office Floor.

Fact.Text: The rooftop offers a panoramic view of the tech district.
Employees sometimes come here to relax or take phone calls.

Exit.Name: Down
Exit.Title: Down
Exit.Description: Stairs lead down into the break room area.

Object.Name: Keycard
Object.Title: Employee Keycard
Object.Description: A plastic badge labeled "Techspire - Level 3 Access".
